name: SURVIVE! (itch) (rtcgames)
description:
This is a very simple, challenging game. All you have to do is survive for a set time on each level.  In the lower levels you do this by avoiding the bouncing diamonds.

At higher levels you get some protection in the form of a shield and/or barriers. There is a printable report screen at the end which will show the player’s name, date of play, and the score for each level.  Good luck.

This game is totally free meaning there are no strings attached. There is no registration, no advertising, no online connections, and no collection of any data whatsoever. This game may be installed on as many devices as you like. It will run on versions of Windows from Vista up to and including Windows 10.  It should work okay in PlayOnLinux for the various Linux distros. This game requires no permissions on installment and can be played without internet or WiFi access.

Contact rtcarman47@gmail.net with comments and suggestions. For other free games go to your favorite source and search for Richard Carman or rtcgames. Thanks and enjoy.
